text: Ah nice congratulations. All I can really suggest is that you show your passion for vfx. Explain how you've signed up to programs like this mentorship one to show how committed you are to learn and you are very keen to work in the field. Drop in that you're keen on learning nuke but also have a passion for motion graphic and that shows your vercitility.
Main thing is just show how keen you are to learn. Let me know how it goes and good luck
Thank you very much! Fingers crossed :grin: I will let you know how it goes
